item.title: Muffin Songs - Hush Little Baby - Key of F, G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
As performed by Muffin Songs in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zs9cCeTsT8Q
I was preparing simpler versions of this song and heard this version and wanted to add the chords to it. This song, with a key change and some easier added chords really makes this song fun to play.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Muffin Songs - Are You Sleeping - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Muffin Songs (https://youtu.be/Ai9A_yvzPbQ). Original is in the Key of D, pitch has been dropped to the Key of C.
This play along uses the string colors of the KIDS Ukulele Strings, as made by Aquila. Individual sets are priced to make a donation of a set of strings to organizations like Ukulele Kids Club; Classroom sets (20 pack) can be purchased at a VERY affordable price directly from Aquila.
The colored font is a part of Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com

item.title: Muffin Songs - Row Row Row Your Boat - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Muffin Songs (For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Muffin Songs (https://youtu.be/Ai9A_yvzPbQ). Original is in the Key of D, pitch has been dropped to the Key of C.
This play along uses the string colors of the KIDS Ukulele Strings, as made by Aquila. Individual sets are priced to make a donation of a set of strings to organizations like Ukulele Kids Club; Classroom sets (20 pack) can be purchased at a VERY affordable price directly from Aquila.
The colored font is a part of Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com). Original is in multiple keys...this version only uses the last key change and raises the key to C.
This play along uses the string colors of the KIDS Ukulele Strings, as made by Aquila. Individual sets are priced to make a donation of a set of strings to organizations like Ukulele Kids Club; Classroom sets (20 pack) can be purchased at a VERY affordable price directly from Aquila.
The colored font is a part of Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com
